analysis.description:
AuctionBase.getFees (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#702-704) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#704)

Reentrancy in CozyTimeAuction.buyCozy (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#748-799):
	External calls:
	- affiliate = affiliateContract.userToAffiliate(_pepeReceiver) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#768-769)
	- ! pepeContract.cozyTime(auction.pepeId,_cozyCandidate,_pepeReceiver) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#778-783)
	- ! pepeContract.cozyTime(_cozyCandidate,auction.pepeId,_pepeReceiver) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#785-787)
	- ! pepeContract.transfer(auction.seller,_pepeId) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#789-790)
	External calls sending eth:
	- auction.seller.transfer(price - totalFee) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#763-765)
	- affiliate != address(0) && affiliate.send(totalFee / 2) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#769-776)
	- _pepeReceiver.transfer(msg.value - price) (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#791-792)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- auctions (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#796-798)
Mining.mint (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#1960-1986) allows anyone to destruct the contract
Genetic.breed (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#16-299) is declared view but contains assembly code
Genetic.randomDNA (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#300-351) is declared view but contains assembly code
PepeBase.isContract (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#1551-1559) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#504-534) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#510-511)

PepeBase (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#959-1559) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#1421-1428)

PepeBase._safeTransferFromInternal (/unique_chucks/2/0xbc2afc039d2bfa67d582ac181dab5be17ec91f82.sol#1499-1519) uses a dangerous strict equality:
